home.tests.test_views module¶

class home.tests.test_views.TestViews(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: django.test.testcases.TestCase

This is a conceptual Unittest child case class for testing views.py.

Parameters:TestCase (functions) – It inherits built-in child functionalities of django unittest, which handels all test cases.
